AD_KethericCombat.synopsis: Players triggered outcast state in MOO by attacking Ketheric in execution or going to the roof before time.Plays in the first combat Ketheric participates when the state is active.

AD_ZrellCombat.synopsis: Players triggered outcast state in MOO by attacking Ketheric in execution or going to the roof before time.Plays in the first combat Zrell participates when the state is active.

automatic_ordering.reasoning: Both the AD_KethericCombat and AD_ZrellCombat sessions share the same triggering conditions—players entering the outcast state by attacking Ketheric or going to the roof before time. Each session represents the first combat encounter for either Ketheric or Zrell when that state is active, implying that in a single playthrough only one of these first-combat events will occur. Thus, they are mutually exclusive: triggering one prevents the other from appearing as the 'first combat' event. There is no strict ordering between them as neither causes the other.

AD_KethericCombat_0.speaker: Ketheric Thorm
AD_KethericCombat_0.text: Take your penance - in Her name.
